about_the_game:
In Devil Slot Machine, you need to battle demons incarnated as pinballs on a slot machine. Purchase various chips to build a strong defense. However, remember that demons are always cunning, so be prepared.

The demo now fully supports English, and the main game's English version is nearing completion. Welcome to add Devil Slot Machine to your wishlist!

Life is Precious

After each battle, you can purchase chips in the shop and place them on the battlefield. You can also upgrade the shop, refresh goods to find desirable chips, but all of this consumes your precious life points. Completing levels will reward you with life points, and there are many chips that restore life points waiting to be discovered.

Construct Your Build

Chips have various abilities: pirates excel at producing life points, flower fairies are skilled at group combat, and different chip systems can create magical synergies.

Powerful Talents

After passing specific wave-based levels, you can choose one of four different talents, each with powerful abilities, some of which can even affect the gameplay!

Bullet Time

Players will continuously shoot cards to charge chips, and charged chips will fire different bullet patterns based on their elemental attributes: fireballs, wind blades, lightning strikes, ice explosions... Enjoy the mesmerizing bullet hell.

Game Features

  • Roguelike pinball tower defense experience

  • Screen-filling dazzling bullet patterns

  • Retro dark pixel art style

  • Loads of pinballs!

short_description: On a cursed slot machine, you engage in a deadly game of souls with the demons. Devil Slot Machine is a roguelike pinball tower defense game. Purchase chips as defensive towers and release elemental bullets to destroy your enemies. Enjoy the exhilarating feeling of annihilating demons!
